pr_title: Fix misleading format in parse_datetime tests

timeline.bodyText: maybe just fix the test cases to use yyyy/MM/dd correctly?
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -733,6 +733,21 @@ public void testParseDatetime()
         assertFunction("parse_datetime('1960/01/22 03:04 +0500', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm Z')",
                 TIMESTAMP_WITH_TIME_ZONE,
                 toTimestampWithTimeZone(new DateTime(1960, 1, 22, 3, 4, 0, 0, DateTimeZone.forOffsetHours(5))));
+
+        // The above 'YYYY/MM/DD' returns unexpected result when the month of year isn't January. The format should be 'yyyy/MM/dd'

timeline.message: Fix misleading format in parse_datetime tests
Fix misleading format in parse_datetime tests
